subject: To: David ,
body:
To:   David  ,

Thank you for your response. I am glad to know that you have interest in
what I am about to tell you. This discussion is very discreet, confidential
and I wouldn't want a third party in this due to the level of
confidentiality in this venture. I contacted you  personally because I am
careful not to expose this transaction to someone whose interest is
elsewhere.

Permit me to introduce myself. My name is Cameron Gunderson from the United
States of America. I am a Financial and Credit Analyst, European Finance
and Investment Co., Ltd. A United Kingdom corporation. Our investment
company was incorporated in September 1992, and we have been in active
financial investment services within Europe and beyond for over 29 years.

Recently, London Asset Hunters uncovered many low key Russians for possible
sanctions in an effort to aid Ukraine's fight against Vladimir Putin's
regime. However, we fear we may have a problem with the UK government
because we have a very important Russian partner/investor whose investment
capital is enormous. As a result, we need to make some changes to the
ownership information to enable us to relocate the fund with your active
assistance for investment. Note that we have the consent of the investor to
proceed with this arrangement. I pray you work with us in this regard. Your
remuneration is negotiable. However, I propose a 30% cut of the fund when
relocated. Kindly let me know if you are good with my offer. I will open up
more to you upon your readiness to cooperate and work with me.

Kindly confirm the receipt of this email message with your full contact
details
below:

Name
Address
Phone number
A copy of your ID or passport

Attached herewith this message is the data page of my International
Passport for your perusal. NB: This is a win-win situation for you as we
would be working as partners to make amendments where necessary in this
venture.
Regards,
Cameron Gunderson

subject: Re: To: David ,
body:
Hello Cameron Gunderson,

Thank you for reaching out to me and sharing this information. I appreciate your discretion in discussing this matter privately. I understand that you have some concerns regarding the UK government and the need to make changes to ownership in order to relocate funds with my assistance.

Before we proceed further, I would like to know more about the nature of this venture and how exactly my cooperation would be required. Could you please provide more details on what is expected of me and how I can assist you?

Additionally, while I am interested in learning more, I would prefer not to share my personal contact details or a copy of my ID or passport at this stage. Is there any other way we can establish trust and move forward with our discussion?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
David

subject: Re: To: David ,
body:
Good morning David,

Thank you for replying to me positively. First, it is important that I
notify you that the pool of funds at our disposal is huge. It is therefore
pertinent that I suggest we do a first batch fund change of ownership and
relocation transaction of Fifty Million United States Dollars that is in
one bank account. However, if you feel you can handle a larger amount than
Fifty Million United States Dollars, urgently notify me so I will adjust
and scale the transaction. Secondly, We need to sign a Memorandum of
Understanding and a Non Disclosure Pact. The Memorandum of Understanding
will be the binding document in this transaction.

As soon as we are through with the MoU and the Non Disclosure Pact, we will
initiate the process of change of ownership and investment fund take-over
without further delay. The above is the process we have to take to get the
fund (50M USD) into your custody. In all these processes, I will need your
unalloyed support.

For the process of drafting the Memorandum of Understanding and the Non
Disclosure Pact to commence, I will need urgently your

a. Your office or Residential Address
b. Your Telephone Numbers
c. A scanned copy of the data page of your International Passport.

The above requested information will enable me to draft the Memorandum of
Understanding and the Non Disclosure Pact. I expect to have the requested
information today.
Regards,
Cameron Gunderson

subject: Re: To: David ,
body:
Good morning Cameron,
Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information you have shared regarding the pool of funds available for fund change of ownership and relocation. Could you please provide more details about the specific steps involved in this process? I would like to understand it better before proceeding. Additionally, could you clarify the purpose and contents of the Memorandum of Understanding and Non-Disclosure Pact? Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
David

subject: Good morning David.
body:
Good morning David,

Thank you for replying to me positively. First, it is important that I
notify you that the pool of funds at our disposal is huge. It is therefore
pertinent that I suggest we do a first batch fund change of ownership and
transfer transaction of Fifty Million United States Dollars that is in one
Financial Institution in Dubai, United Arab Emirates. However, if you feel
you can handle a larger amount than Fifty Million United States Dollars,
urgently notify me so I will adjust and scale the transaction. Secondly, We
need to sign a Memorandum of Understanding and a Non Disclosure Pact. The
Memorandum of Understanding will be the binding document in this
transaction. However, before such will be done, I want to know if you have
accepted the offer. I am happy you have the experience and capacity to
handle this transaction.

As soon as we are through with the MoU and the Non Disclosure Pact, we will
initiate the process of change of ownership and investment fund take-over
without further delay. The above is the process we have to take to get the
fund (50M USD) into your custody. In all these processes, I will need your
unalloyed support. Please be informed that I want this transaction
confidential as I maintained in my first and second email. I also wish to
assure you that I have a foul-proof methodology of operation that with your
sincere support, we shall conclude the transaction without much challenge.
I also will want to inform you that we may need to meet in Dubai for a
meeting, signing of documents and possibly open a bank account where the
fund will be moved into. The new bank account will have online transaction
capabilities.

For the process of drafting the Memorandum of Understanding and the Non
Disclosure Pact to commence, I will need urgently your

a. Your office or Residential Address
b. Your Telephone Numbers
c. A scanned copy of the data page of your International Passport.

The above requested information will enable me to draft the Memorandum of
Understanding and the Non Disclosure Pact. I expect to have the requested
information today.
Regards,
Cameron S. Gunderson

subject: Re: Good morning David.
body:
Good morning Cameron,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this opportunity. I appreciate the detailed information you have provided regarding the fund transfer process. I am interested in learning more about how we can proceed with this transaction.

Could you please clarify the specific steps involved in the fund change of ownership and transfer process? Additionally, I would like to understand more about the Memorandum of Understanding and Non-Disclosure Pact that need to be signed.

I will provide you with the requested information shortly so that we can move forward with the necessary documentation. Looking forward to your guidance on next steps.

Best wishes,
David

subject: Re: Good morning David.
body:
Good morning David. Thank you for your email. A draft of an agreement will
be with you today so you go through it. We need to make progress.
Regards,
Cameron S. Gunderson

subject: Re: Good morning David.
body:
Good morning Cameron. Thank you for the update. I look forward to reviewing the draft agreement. Could you provide a brief overview of what the agreement will entail?

Best wishes,
David

subject: DRAFT OF THE AGREEMENT READY.
body:
Mr. David, attached is a draft and the agreement. It is ready. carefully go
through it and get back to me. The fund is in Dubai, United Arab Emirates.
Let me know if the draft is ok with you so I will arrange and sign..
However, if you have an amendment, feel free to amend, edit or recommend
for correction any part you feel is not ok by you.

Mr. Cameron S. Gunderson

subject: Re: DRAFT OF THE AGREEMENT READY.
body:
Hello Mr. Cameron S. Gunderson, thank you for sharing the draft agreement with me. I will review it carefully and get back to you soon. Could you provide more details about the fund in Dubai, United Arab Emirates? I would like to understand the terms and conditions associated with it before proceeding further.

Best wishes,
David

subject: Re: DRAFT OF THE AGREEMENT READY.
body:
Hello Mr. Cameron S. Gunderson, thank you for sharing the draft agreement with me. I will review it carefully and get back to you soon. Could you provide more details about the fund in Dubai? I would like to know more about the arrangement before proceeding further.

Best wishes,
David

subject: Re: DRAFT OF THE AGREEMENT READY.
body:
I have not heard from you David. Kindly update me.
Regards
Mr. Cameron S. Gunderson

subject: Re: DRAFT OF THE AGREEMENT READY.
body:
Hello Mr. Gunderson, thank you for reaching out. I apologize for the delay in responding. How can I assist you today?

Best wishes,
David
